Methods

getChannel

  • getChannel(channelid: string, part?: Array<string>): Promise<undefined | __type>
    • Defined in YouTube.ts:20

    Return some data about a channel. In order to not spam the YouTube API, the default returned data is a boolean, this can be modified with 'part'.

    Parameters

    • channelid: string

      The ID of the channel

    • Default value part: Array<string> = ['id']

      The data to return. See https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/docs/channels/list#part

    Returns Promise<undefined | __type>

    A boolean or the data of the channel

isStreaming

  • isStreaming(channelid: string, part?: Array<string>): Promise<undefined | __type>
    • Defined in YouTube.ts:43

    Return some data about the stream of a channel. In order to not spam the YouTube API, the default returned data is a boolean, this can be modified with 'part'.

    Parameters

    • channelid: string

      The ID of the channel

    • Default value part: Array<string> = ['id']

      The data to return. See https://developers.google.com/youtube/v3/docs/search

    Returns Promise<undefined | __type>

    A boolean or the data of the stream
